glsa.title: tripwire: Format string vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability allowing arbitrary code execution under certain circumstances has been found.

background.p: tripwire is an open source file integrity checker.

description.p: The code that generates email reports contains a format string vulnerability in pipedmailmessage.cpp.

impact.p: With a carefully crafted filename on a local filesystem an attacker could cause execution of arbitrary code with permissions of the user running tripwire, which could be the root user.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All tripwire users should upgrade to the latest stable version:
